Posts.Content: littleflower01 wrote: I am 66 and just had lumpectomy in left breast  for infiltrating ductal carcinoma, grade 2 associated with intermediate and high grade DCIS, with calcifications.  Nine years ago I had a masectomy in right breast because of infiltrating lobular tumor.  I had chemo and tried taking Tamoxifin and other similar meds but couldn't tolerate the side effects.  I had a score of 18 on genome test so am trying to decide whether to have chemo this time.  One of my concerns is that my hair has been thinning for the past two years anyway.  Does anyone know if there is a problem with hair growing back in a person with already thinning hair?
